sense.gloss: the real pleasure (of something), the real thrill, the true charm
ghee (held to be the greatest of all flavours), the ultimate truth of Buddhism, nirvana

sdata.j: ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑作↑↓つく↓った↑例文↑↓れいぶん↓がさまざまな↑言語↑↓げんご↓に↑訳↑↓やく↓されて、↑間接↑↓かんせつ↓↑的↑↓てき↓に↑他↑↓ほか↓の↑言語↑↓げんご↓の↑学習↑↓がくしゅう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓の↑役↑↓やく↓にも↑立↑↓た↓つことになるというのが、タトエバの↑醍醐味↑↓だいごみ↓の↑一↑↓ひと↓つです。
sdata.e: The most satisfying thing about Tatoeba is that the sentences I've written have been translated into several languages and are indirectly useful to students of other languages.

words.gloss: the real pleasure (of something), the real thrill, the true charm
ghee (held to be the greatest of all flavours), the ultimate truth of Buddhism, nirvana
